title: sampling train data and use prediction as feature
description: This notebook is original fork from Convert to Regression, thanks to Bruno Aquino.  The idea of sampling is from discusion. The idea of "use agg stat feature of prediction" is from qchemdog's solusion in Kaggle home credit default risk competition
